title: Pixel 3 Phone app issue - business search results not displayed
content:
Hi all, 

I have  Pixel 3 XL, owned since new, all updates and fixes applied.

If I restart my phone, and open the stock phone app, I am able to search my contacts and also get local business results.

after some time, a day, a few days, the business search results stop being displayed.

there are no permission restrictions on the app.

this was happening with 10 and now 11.

Thanks
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
